summary: A comedy concert film that captures the on-stage performance and inspirational success story of Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias.
cast: Gabriel Iglesias|Jacqueline Obradors|Gina Brillon|Alfred Robles|Armando Cosio|Rick Gutierrez|Eddie 'Piolin' Sotelo|Jeremy Ray Valdez|Ron White|Ray William Johnson|Tommy Chong|Juliocesar Chavez|Martin Moreno
title: The Fluffy Movie: Unity Through Laughter
